success_criteria: input element, type of "file", missing an associated label.

error_fixes.problem_type: Input element type 'file' missing associated label
error_fixes.fixed_line: <label for="file">Choose a file:</label><input type="file" id="file" name="file" class="input-field">

success_criteria: input element, type of "checkbox", missing an associated label

error_fixes.problem_type: Input element of type checkbox missing an associated label
error_fixes.fixed_line: <label for="subscribe"><input type="checkbox" id="subscribe" name="subscribe" class="input-field"> Subscribe to our newsletter</label>

success_criteria: In content implemented using markup languages, elements have complete start and end tags.

error_fixes.problem_type: Elements are missing complete end tags

error_fixes.offending_line: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-game-video-id" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture">
error_fixes.fixed_line: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-game-video-id" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"></iframe>

success_criteria: Audio or video element avoids automatically playing audio
fixed_example:
<video controls>
<source src="bookstore-video.mp4" type="video/mp4">
Your browser does not support the video tag.
</video>

error_fixes.problem_type: Audio or video element avoids automatically playing audio
error_fixes.offending_line:
<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-game-video-id" frameborder="0"
            allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"

error_fixes.fixed_line:
<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/your-game-video-id" frameborder="0"

success_criteria: select element missing an associated label
error_example:
<select id="filter">
<option value="genre">Genre</option>
<option value="author">Author</option>
<!-- Add more filter options -->
</select>
fixed_example:
<label for="filter">Filter</label>
<select id="filter">
<option value="genre">Genre</option>
<option value="author">Author</option>
<!-- Add more filter options -->
</select>

error_fixes.problem_type: select element missing an associated label
Select element missing an associated label
